item.title: CVE-2024-32569|2024-08-02T02:13:39.832Z -- metaphor%20creations -- ditty
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Metaphor Creations Ditty allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ditty: from n/a through 3.1.31.
